title: Tata Curvv.ev SUV launched: Price, range, features & what's new
description: At present, Tata Motors boasts to have four EVs in its portfolio: Nexon.ev, Punch.ev, Tiago.ev and Tigor.ev. Today's launch of Curvv.ev, a blend of toughness of an SUV and sporty silhouette of a coup√©, makes the fifth addition to its evolving EV range.
